### <a href="http://palaeoverse.org" style="text-decoration: none">**palaeoverse**</a>
*Developed by palaeobiologists, for palaeobiologists*

palaeoverse provides functionality to support data preparation and exploration for palaeobiological analyses, improving code reproducibility and accessibility. The wider aim of palaeoverse is to bring the palaeobiological community together to establish agreed standards. The package includes functionality for data cleaning, binning (time and space), exploration, summarisation, and visualisation. <a href="http://palaeoverse.org" style="text-decoration: none">Go to site...</a>
